title: Bide meets with Scholz in Washington, as Macron and Putin meet in Moscow
content:
1. Bide meets with Scholz in Washington, as Macron and Putin meet in Moscow  The Washington Post
  2. France's Macron flies to Moscow as a new round of talks over Ukraine begins  NPR
  3. France’s Macron flies to meet Putin in risky bid to avert war  CNBC
  4. Macron Meets With Putin in Russia: Live Ukraine News  The New York Times
  5. Kremlin expects no decisive breakthrough from Putin-Macron meeting  Reuters
